description: This scholarship was established to provide scholarship assistance to the students within the University of Central OklahomaÂ’s Department of Art. Eligibility Studio Art, Art History, or Art Education Major Cumulative GPA 3.0+ Enrolled in 6 hours of art coursework Demonstrate excellence in area of emphasis Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript
